reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater dress fits well, with one mentioning it stops right above the knee, and they appreciate its thicker-than-expected material. Customers find it comfortable and consider it better than expected for the price.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must Have
items.body: Buy it! This is a must have in your wardrobe. Looks exactly like the picture. The length is perfect, stops right above the knee. It has some thickness to it and itâ€™s super comfortable. Read more
items.author: Nicole

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So cute!
items.body: This is a really plush, soft sweater dress, a little short but I intend to wear with tights and boots so all is forgiven. I ordered and usually take a large, but had the usual bigger bust issue as with many things- if youâ€™re bigger than a C, the placket is going to gap. I undid all but the last button to mitigate this, as this is pretty fitted if you size it right. Ordering an XL to fit the boobs would make the dress a little too big. Unfortunately, even though itâ€™s thick sweater material, it also wants to cling and show every roll and lump, so I may have to wear a shaper with it. Maybe I should try the XL but still think it would look bulky. Left off one star for the tighter chest and bulge show. I got the army green, styled it with blue and green Black Watch plaid tights and a pair of those delicious Dream Pairs faux suede heeled knee boots in blue. Adorable! I usually donâ€™t talk about other brands or items in a review, but if youâ€™re not familiar with Dream Pairs boots, go look at their page/products. Prices are unbelievable, and I just canâ€™t get over how comfortable they are , and how well all of mine have held up. In particular, their faux suede knee and thigh high boots are to die for for comfort and looks. I have a collection and have different pairs in just about every color they offer at this point. I mention this because of how perfectly their boots go with these types of dresses in winter. They are so cozy warm on your legs, so even with a shorter skirt/dress, youâ€™re still comfortable. Their boots give you the ability to say that a pair of thigh high, sexy looking heeled suede boots are actually a practical winter piece, lol. But I digressâ€¦ back to the dress. Worth a shot! Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: iâ€™ve worn this a million times since purchasing itâ€™s so comfortable and washes well! Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and great quality
items.body: Great dress, returned so I could purchase in a different color. The texture and quality are soft, warm and thick. I have no complaints Read more
items.author: Cheyenle

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Short Girl Friendly!
items.body: Love this cute fit and flare sweater dress! I'm 5' and 115 and finally found a dress that fits and age appropriate for a 63 year old. I am not a frumpy grandmother! ðŸ¤ª If it was ðŸ’¯ cotton and a lil bit softer, I would give 5 stars! Can't wait to wear when weather gets cooler next week! Read more
items.author: Half-dozen Mom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super flattering and warm
items.body: Super flattering sweater dress. The length is just right on my 5'1" frame. I wear a shaper underneath so it slides smoothly over any bumps. Read more
items.author: Dramatic License

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing quality material, just runs big
items.body: Quality is very good! Itâ€™s nice and thick and warm without being itchy. It does have a good stretch to it too. However even the small (smallest size offered) still swallowed me whole. I am not too mad about it as I really got it for a costume, but I would honestly get it taken in at the waist just to add into my wardrobe! Read more
items.author: Faith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprised!
items.body: I got a small. Iâ€™m 5â€™3 about 120. Thicker than expected which is great. Skirt Hangs really nice with a touch of loft/movement to it. Color is rich. Didnâ€™t expect much but was pleasantly surprised! Read more
items.author: lovely1beauty

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Khaki, Pink, White, Burgundy, Dark Grey, Apricot, Army Green, Dark Blue, Black, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
